attributes.action: Reduce council tax so that we only pay for services that we use
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I want people to back this. It is unfair that many of us don;t use the services that we pay for withour council tax. I put forward to you - the prime mimister - that we the undersigned no longer wish t opay for a service we do not use. We wish for you to set up a pay as you use scheme that will benefit those of us that take our refuse direct to the local skips, we recycle what we can without using council services, we don't use ambulance's - it's just as quick to get a taxi in most cases.  Please listen to our cause - pay as you use service's are the way forward for the countyr.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
